enhanced_description: PITCS, also known as Poonam IT Consulting Services, is an ISO 27001:2013 certified global provider of Staffing, Recruitment Solutions, Payroll Services, Flexi Staffing, and HR Consulting Services. Established in 2006, the company leverages over two decades of expertise, operating from its headquarters in Bangalore with branch offices across various cities in India and globally. As a technology-backed firm, PITCS offers comprehensive advice and support for Recruitment & Payroll Services, aiming for quick turnaround times in the hiring process for organizations worldwide.
